title: Unchained Alistar
body: The code for the Unchained Alistar doesn't work. Please help!

replies.body:
*Wolfess* is spot on with their instructions to resolve this. It is possible that Blitzcrank bot won't get your ticket, so it may or may not take a bit for someone to get back to you about this. Avoid reply to or "bumping" your ticket before someone gets back to you, as it sends your ticket to the back of the queue.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Unchained Alistar is a known problem due to the way the youtube page works and not being able to redirect you for subscribing.

thankfully since it's a known issue, it's an easy fix!

Just send Riot a support ticket through their support page, here's a quick link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new

Make sure to select “I have a question About League of Legends/Riot Games” and category “Games and Features > General Questions”.

Then give them a quick summary about not being able to get your Unchained Alistar skin, maybe 2-3 sentences mentioning it and asking for help.

If the system detects the key words that it's designed to pick up then you should get a reply message from BlitzcrankBot to inform you that it has been taken care of and added to your account within a few minutes!

Hope that helps and enjoy~
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
